author: ballcock
title: Holly Willoughby forced to apologise after Joey Essex SWEARS live on This Morning in another studio when his mic is left on
text:
TV Magazine THE ONLY WAY IS EXPLETIVE Holly Willoughby forced to apologise after Joey Essex SWEARS live on This Morning in another studio when his mic is left on 
The presenter apologised to viewers on behalf of the ITV show after the blooper By BETH ALLCOCK. Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments HOLLY Willoughby was forced to apologise to This Morning viewers after Joey Essex was caught swearing live on air. 
The presenter had chatted to the former Towie star in the studio’s Green Room just moments before yet viewers heard him say “f
